channel.title: Hu-Yoshida on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Hu-Yoshida on Argolon Solutions

item.title: The first major Storage Industry Blog?
item.description: We recently discovered that Hu Yoshida, Vice President and CTO of Hitachi Data Systems (HDS) has a blog. This may not seem to be a big deal to many people but it is actually a very major change on several different levels by one of the top players in a traditionally secretive industry. The storage industry has been built entirely on a foundation of proprietary technologies until quite recently. There are very few companies operating in this space at the top end; HP, EMC, IBM and HDS.
